name: Sea Clicker
description:
Sea Clicker

==============================================================

Use your mouse

Click on the large moving icon

At the top middle of your screen is how much trash you have collected

Try to collect more than 300,000,000 trash and you win

You can upgrade your click by pressing the button at the bottom left and right of your screen

At the top left and right of your screen show how much you have upgraded your click

==============================================================

play online(with no bug):

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/597080742/

==============================================================

follow me on scratch to see more cool games:

==============================================================

Bug:

If you try to move the character that follows your mouse outside the water it will freeze

(comment if you find any more bug)

==============================================================

that all, thanks and enjoy the game :) 

==============================================================
